charinfo.name: Namikaze Minato
charinfo.description: A Jounin, and Squad Leader of Konoha, known as the Yellow Flash, Minato is the father of Naruto. Minato fights using space-time jutsu and a number of unique kunai to teleport around the battlefield.

abilities.name: Flying Thunder God
abilities.description: Using his teleportation abilities, Minato either attacks one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them or defends an ally making them invulnerable for 1 turn. Minato will also become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Wide Area Sensing
abilities.description: Minato senses the area around the battlefield. For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to become invulnerable or reduce damage. This skill ignores invulnerability. During this time, Minato will gain 1 random chakra each turn.

abilities.name: Space Time Marking
abilities.description: For 3 turns Minato will mark his target each time he uses 'Flying Thunder God' on them for 1 turn. If an ally is marked, if 'Flying Thunder God' is used, that ally will become invulnerable for 1 turn. if an enemy is marked, if 'Flying Thunder God' is used, that enemy will receive 30 damage.

abilities.name: Flying Light
abilities.description: This skill makes Namikaze Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.
